summary: Product listing enhancements for used items: product age, verification badge, return policy display, and multi-image uploads.

existing_features.title: Update the shopkeeper product creation UI to capture: (1) used-product age text shown only when condition is Used, (2) product verification label(s) allowing selection of "Verified Product" and/or "Quality Checked", and (3) return policy selection among "Return Available", "No Return", and "Exchange Only"; submit these values when creating a product.

Display the new product fields on the product detail page: show a Product age section for used items, show product verification badge(s)/labels, and show a Return policy section with the selected value.
Ensure multiple image upload is supported end-to-end for product creation and product detail viewing, allowing multiple photos to be uploaded, previewed, stored, and browsed in the gallery.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add product age field for used items (e.g., "Used for 6 months", "Purchased in 2024")
Add product verification badge/labels (e.g., "Verified Product", "Quality Checked")
Add return policy section with display options: Return Available / No Return / Exchange Only
Support uploading multiple images per product (especially for used items to show condition)

Extend the backend Product model to store used-product age text, product verification labels, and a return policy value, and include these fields anywhere products are returned to the frontend (e.g., product detail and browse listings).

Update backend create/update product APIs to accept and persist the new fields (used-product age text, product verification label(s), and return policy), applying basic validation so that product age is only accepted when condition is used.
Add a conditional migration for existing product records so the new product fields have safe defaults after upgrade (do not break existing deployments/state).

projectName: Add used-product age, product verification labels, return policy, and ensure multi-image uploads
